text:
@Scaramucci Of what? @realDonaldTrump and @gop's #covid19 #AmericanGenocide? 

Of mass homelessness and the wealthy swooping in to buy up distressed property? 

Of Losing to @JoeBiden? 

Meh, another day of "Winning".
